meta.title: Olivier Jeannette | Web Developer & AI/Automation Specialist
meta.description: Web Developer specializing in AI-augmented development, process automation, and business scaling. Former SF Paramedic. Available for opportunities in Calgary, Alberta.

hero.badge: Open to: Web Dev • AI/Automation • Process Consulting
hero.tagline: I build systems that scale businesses and run themselves.

about.label: What I'm Looking For
about.title: Web Development,
bio: I'm looking for roles in Web Development, AI Integration, or Process Automation Consulting. My strength: I understand both the technical and business sides, so I build solutions that actually work in the real world.

Proof? I built La Skàli from scratch—a CrossFit gym in a highly competitive market. While coaching 72h/week (9am-9pm, Mon-Sat, 6 years, 3 weeks vacation every 2 years), I also handled ALL the tech: website, booking system, custom management app, Meta Ads, SEO, sales funnels, and automation workflows. I replaced €3K/year in SaaS with tools I built myself.

I thrive in high-intensity environments where I need to learn fast, optimize constantly, and deliver results. Whether it's helping companies automate their processes, building web applications, or integrating AI into workflows—I'm ready.

items.tools: Dev Tools (VS Code, GitHub, Discord, Notion)

cta.title: Ready to work together?
cta.description: I'm currently open to opportunities in Calgary, Alberta. Let's discuss how I can bring value to your team.

summary.title: Professional Summary
summary.content: Web Developer and Process Automation specialist with a unique background: Special Forces Paramedic turned entrepreneur. Built and scaled a gym from zero to €120K/year while developing all digital infrastructure solo. Looking for roles in Web Development, AI Integration, or Business Process Consulting in Alberta.

interested.title: Interested?
interested.description: Download my complete resume in PDF format or contact me directly.

laskali.title: Founder & General Manager (Solo Entrepreneur)
description: Built and scaled a gym from zero to €120K/year in a highly competitive market (5+ direct competitors in Laval)
WORKLOAD: 72h/week (9am-9pm, Mon-Sat), 6 years, only 3 weeks vacation every 2 years
WEB DEVELOPMENT: Built complete website with booking system, member portal, and admin dashboard (Next.js, Supabase)
CUSTOM SOFTWARE: Developed gym management app replacing €3K/year in SaaS (member tracking, billing, WOD programming)
DIGITAL MARKETING: SEO strategy achieving Top 3 Google for 'CrossFit Laval', Meta Ads campaigns, content creation
AUTOMATION: Implemented N8N/Make workflows for invoicing, follow-ups, reporting, and data sync
SALES & FUNNELS: Built conversion funnels, handled all sales calls, negotiated B2B partnerships (Gymlib, Wellpass, HYROX)
P&L MANAGEMENT: Full financial responsibility - budgeting, pricing, cost optimization, tax compliance
Preparing business for turnkey sale with fully documented processes and systems

coaching-career.title: Sports Coach & Fitness Professional
description: 3-year progression from volunteer to certified professional coach
BPJEPS AF certification (Weightlifting/Bodybuilding option) - French state diploma
Personal training, group classes, and program design
Client acquisition, retention strategies, and business development as self-employed
Foundation skills that led to founding La Skàli

military.title: Special Forces Operator - Combat Paramedic
description: 7 years in French Special Forces unit (13ème Régiment de Dragons Parachutistes)
Combat Paramedic: tactical medical care in high-stress environments
Multiple deployments to Africa and Middle East
Team pharmacy manager and medical logistics
TCCC specialist (Tactical Combat Casualty Care)
Key skills developed: decision-making under pressure, autonomy, adaptability, resilience
